name: Next Target In T-8 Seconds
description:
It so happens that the "just in time manufacturing" policy finally got to your division.
You were just a bomb silo janitor, and it's good you got a promotion, however your new job is assembling bombs to-order, given 8 seconds before plane reaches the target. Not not to mention, you're the one who shoves them out.. At least the pension plan is better.

Playable in browser, but for better experience use standalone executable.

Bomb recipies:

High explosive
Fill bomb body with RDX at the station (red lever up), attach detonator (yellow cone) and red fins.

Torpedo
Fill bomb body with TorpEx at the station (red lever down), attach detonator (yellow cone) and blue propeller.

Cluster
Arm submunitions (yellow cylinders) with caps (small yellow caps) and load 3 of them inside the bomb body, attach detonator (yellow cone) and red fins.

Those operations can be done in any (logical) order.
Incomplete bombs are better than nothing.

Controls:

Mouse
Look aroundLMB Click
Pick up/drop, connect or interact with items
RMB Hold
Zoom / Rotate item in hand

Made for MontenegroGameJam2023 in 48h
